title: North Merritt Island, Florida
text:
North Merritt Island is a <a href="census-designated%20place">census-designated place</a> (CDP) in <a href="Brevard%20County%2C%20Florida">Brevard County</a>, <a href="Florida">Florida</a>, United States. It occupies a portion of the physical Merritt Island, north of the CDP of <a href="Merritt%20Island%2C%20Florida">Merritt Island</a> and south of <a href="Merritt%20Island%20National%20Wildlife%20Refuge">Merritt Island National Wildlife Refuge</a>. <a href="Florida%20State%20Road%203">Florida State Road 3</a> is the main highway through the community, leading north to <a href="Florida%20State%20Road%20405">Florida State Road 405</a> and south to <a href="Florida%20State%20Road%20528">Florida State Road 528</a>.
North Merritt Island was first listed as a CDP prior to the <a href="2020%20United%20States%20census">2020 census</a>.
